languages.text: Вывел Домин старец Вени'Заккари из пылкой топки крематория, и побрели они мимо колонн мертвецов. Одежды их истлели, и кости их царапали аугментику и рвали ветхую плоть. Скорбно стенали они, и от звуков этих память гасла. Узрел{mf||а} Домин, что несут мертвецы ковчег, а в ковчеге — Нечто. Потерянное дитя, что в шелковом коконе лило кровавые слезы по неизвестности. Словно госпожу, несли неживые ее и причитали о судьбе. Таков клинок, погрязший в думах о потерянном прошлом — беспомощный ребенок, парализованный сожалениями.

traits.locale_text: Вывел Домин старец Вени'Заккари из пылкой топки крематория, и побрели они мимо колонн мертвецов. Одежды их истлели, и кости их царапали аугментику и рвали ветхую плоть. Скорбно стенали они, и от звуков этих память гасла. Узрел{mf||а} Домин, что несут мертвецы ковчег, а в ковчеге — Нечто. Потерянное дитя, что в шелковом коконе лило кровавые слезы по неизвестности. Словно госпожу, несли неживые ее и причитали о судьбе. Таков клинок, погрязший в думах о потерянном прошлом — беспомощный ребенок, парализованный сожалениями.

languages.text: Veni'Zacchary led the Domin out of the hot furnace of the crematorium, and they walked past long columns of the dead. Frayed was their attire; their bones scraped against their augmetics and scratched their decrepit flesh. They were moaning sorrowfully, and the sound made memory fade away. The Domin saw that the dead were carrying an ark, and inside the ark was a Thing. A Lost Child cocooned in silk, shedding crimson tears for the unknown. The unliving carried her as servants would carry their lady, and loudly lamented their fate. Such is a blade mired in broodings over a lost past: a helpless child paralysed by regret.
languages.original_text: Вывел Домин старец Вени'Заккари из пылкой топки крематория, и побрели они мимо колонн мертвецов. Одежды их истлели, и кости их царапали аугментику и рвали ветхую плоть. Скорбно стенали они, и от звуков этих память гасла. Узрел{mf||а} Домин, что несут мертвецы ковчег, а в ковчеге — Нечто. Потерянное дитя, что в шелковом коконе лило кровавые слезы по неизвестности. Словно госпожу, несли неживые ее и причитали о судьбе. Таков клинок, погрязший в думах о потерянном прошлом — беспомощный ребенок, парализованный сожалениями.

traits.locale_text: Old Oa'Weisz led the Enim out of the hot furnace of the crematorium, and they walked past long columns of the dead. Thick mould covered their attire; the fungus had grown through their augmetics and into their decrepit flesh. They were moaning sorrowfully, and the sound made memory fade away. The Enim saw that the dead were carrying an ark, and a Thing was inside the ark. A Lost Child cocooned in mycelium, shedding black tears over the unknown. The unliving carried her as servants would carry their lady, and loudly lamented her fate. Such is a blade mired in broodings over a lost past: a helpless child paralysed by regret.

Old Oa'Weisz led the Enim out of the hot furnace of the crematorium, and they walked past long columns of the dead. Thick mould covered their attire; the fungus had grown through their augmetics and into their decrepit flesh. They were moaning sorrowfully, and the sound made memory fade away. The Enim saw that the dead were carrying an ark, and a Thing was inside the ark. A Lost Child cocooned in mycelium, shedding black tears over the unknown. The unliving carried her as servants would carry their lady, and loudly lamented her fate. Such is a blade mired in broodings over a lost past: a helpless child paralysed by regret.

Oa'Weisz led the Enim out of the hot furnace of the crematorium, and they walked past long columns of the dead. Thick mould covered what remained of their attire; the fungus had grown through their augmetics and into their decrepit flesh. They were moaning sorrowfully, and the sound made memory fade away. The Enim saw that the dead were carrying an ark, and inside the ark was a Thing. A Lost Child cocooned in mycelium, shedding black tears for the unknown. The unliving carried her as servants would carry their lady, and loudly lamented her fate. Such is a blade mired in broodings over a lost past: a helpless child paralysed by regret.

The unliving carried her as servants would carry their lady, and loudly lamented their fate. Such is a blade mired in broodings over a lost past: a helpless child paralysed by regret.

Frayed was their attire; their bones scraped against their augmetics and scratched their decrepit flesh. They were moaning sorrowfully, and the sound made memory fade away. The Domin saw that the dead were carrying an ark, and inside the ark was a Thing. A Lost Child cocooned in silk, shedding crimson tears for the unknown. languages.text: Veni'Zacchary führte {mf|den|die} Domin aus dem heißen Ofen des Krematoriums und sie schritten an langen Kolonnen von Toten vorbei. Ihre Kleider waren zerlumpt, ihre Knochen rieben an ihren Augmentierungen und schabten an ihrem hinfälligen Fleisch. Sie stöhnten trauervoll, und das Geräusch ließ Erinnerungen verblassen. {mf|Der|Die} Domin sah, dass die Toten eine Lade trugen, und in der Lade war ein Ding. Ein verlorenes Kind, in Seide gehüllt, das blutrote Tränen um das Unbekannte vergoss. Die Unlebenden trugen es wie Diener ihre Lady tragen würden, und beklagten sich lautstark über ihr Schicksal. Dies ist das Wesen einer Klinge, die in Gedanken an eine verlorene Vergangenheit feststeckt: ein hilfloses Kind, von Reue gelähmt.
languages.original_text: Veni'Zacchary led the Domin out of the hot furnace of the crematorium, and they walked past long columns of the dead. Frayed was their attire; their bones scraped against their augmetics and scratched their decrepit flesh. They were moaning sorrowfully, and the sound made memory fade away. The Domin saw that the dead were carrying an ark, and inside the ark was a Thing. A Lost Child cocooned in silk, shedding crimson tears for the unknown. The unliving carried her as servants would carry their lady, and loudly lamented their fate. Such is a blade mired in broodings over a lost past: a helpless child paralysed by regret.

traits.locale_text: Veni'Zacchary führte {mf|den|die} Domin aus dem heißen Ofen des Krematoriums und sie schritten an langen Kolonnen von Toten vorbei. Ihre Kleider waren zerlumpt, ihre Knochen rieben an ihren Augmentierungen und schabten an ihrem hinfälligen Fleisch. Sie stöhnten trauervoll, und das Geräusch ließ Erinnerungen verblassen. {mf|Der|Die} Domin sah, dass die Toten eine Lade trugen, und in der Lade war ein Ding. Ein verlorenes Kind, in Seide gehüllt, das blutrote Tränen um das Unbekannte vergoss. Die Unlebenden trugen es wie Diener ihre Lady tragen würden, und beklagten sich lautstark über ihr Schicksal. Dies ist das Wesen einer Klinge, die in Gedanken an eine verlorene Vergangenheit feststeckt: ein hilfloses Kind, von Reue gelähmt.

Oa'Weisz führte {mf|den|die} Enim aus dem heißen Ofen des Krematoriums heraus und sie schritten an langen Kolonnen von Toten vorbei. Dicker Schimmel bedeckt, was von ihrer Kleidung noch übrig war. Der Pilz war durch ihre Augmentationen hindurch und in ihr gebrechliches Fleisch hineingewachsen. Sie stöhnten trauervoll, und das Geräusch ließ Erinnerungen verblassen. {mf|Der|Die} Enim sah, dass die Toren eine Lade trugen, und in der Lade war ein Ding. Ein verlorenes Kind, in Mycelium gehüllt, das schwarze Tränen um das Unbekannte vergoss. Die Unlebenden trugen sie, wie Diener ihre Lady tragen würden, und beklagten sich lautstark über ihr Schicksal. Dies ist das Wesen einer Klinge, die in Gedanken an eine verlorene Vergangenheit feststeckt: ein hilfloses Kind, von Reue gelähmt.

languages.text: Veni'Zacchary guio a{mf|l| la} Domin, sacándol{mf|o|a} del horno del crematorio. Pasaron entre largas columnas de muertos vestidos con prendas deshilachadas. Los huesos habían atravesado sus auméticos y penetrado en su decrépita carne. Gemían pesarosos, con un sonido que desterraba la memoria. {mf|El|La} Donim vio que los muertos transportaban un arca, y que en el interior del arca había algo. Una Niña Perdida envuelta en seda, llorando lágrimas escarlata por lo desconocido. Los difuntos la transportaban como sirvientes a su señora, lamentando a voces su destino. Tal es el sino de una hoja perdida en meditaciones sobre un pasado perdido: una niña indefensa, paralizada por los lamentos.
languages.original_text: Veni'Zacchary led the Domin out of the hot furnace of the crematorium, and they walked past long columns of the dead. Frayed was their attire; their bones scraped against their augmetics and scratched their decrepit flesh. They were moaning sorrowfully, and the sound made memory fade away. The Domin saw that the dead were carrying an ark, and inside the ark was a Thing. A Lost Child cocooned in silk, shedding crimson tears for the unknown. The unliving carried her as servants would carry their lady, and loudly lamented their fate. Such is a blade mired in broodings over a lost past: a helpless child paralysed by regret.

traits.locale_text: Veni'Zacchary guio a{mf|l| la} Domin, sacándol{mf|o|a} del horno del crematorio. Pasaron entre largas columnas de muertos vestidos con prendas deshilachadas. Los huesos habían atravesado sus auméticos y penetrado en su decrépita carne. Gemían pesarosos, con un sonido que desterraba la memoria. {mf|El|La} Donim vio que los muertos transportaban un arca, y que en el interior del arca había algo. Una Niña Perdida envuelta en seda, llorando lágrimas escarlata por lo desconocido. Los difuntos la transportaban como sirvientes a su señora, lamentando a voces su destino. Tal es el sino de una hoja perdida en meditaciones sobre un pasado perdido: una niña indefensa, paralizada por los lamentos.

Oa'Weisz guio a{mf|l| la} Enim, sacándol{mf|o|a} del horno del crematorio. Pasaron entre largas columnas de muertos vestidos con prendas cubiertas de moho. Los hongos habían atravesado sus auméticos y penetrado en su decrépita carne. Gemían pesarosos, con un sonido que desterraba la memoria. {mf|El|La} Enim vio que los muertos transportaban un arca, y que en el interior del arca había algo. Una Niña Perdida envuelta en micelio, llorando lágrimas negras por lo desconocido. Los difuntos la transportaban como sirvientes a su señora, lamentando a voces su destino. Tal es el sino de una hoja perdida en meditaciones sobre un pasado perdido: una niña indefensa, paralizada por los lamentos.

languages.text: ザッカリーはドミンを火葬場の熱い炉から連れ出して、死者の長い列を横目に通り過ぎた。彼らの服は擦り切れており、その骨はオーグメティックにこすれ、その老朽化した肉体を傷つけていた。彼らは悲しげなうめき声をあげていた。そしてその声が記憶を遠ざけていく。ドミンは死者が箱舟を運ぶのを見た。絹に包まれた失われた子供が見知らぬもののために紅の涙をこぼしている。生きていない者は従者が女主人を運ぶように彼女を運び、大きな声で自分らの運命を嘆いた。そのような刃物は、失われた過去を思い悩む、後悔で麻痺した無力な子供のようなものだ。
languages.original_text: Veni'Zacchary led the Domin out of the hot furnace of the crematorium, and they walked past long columns of the dead. Frayed was their attire; their bones scraped against their augmetics and scratched their decrepit flesh. They were moaning sorrowfully, and the sound made memory fade away. The Domin saw that the dead were carrying an ark, and inside the ark was a Thing. A Lost Child cocooned in silk, shedding crimson tears for the unknown. The unliving carried her as servants would carry their lady, and loudly lamented their fate. Such is a blade mired in broodings over a lost past: a helpless child paralysed by regret.

traits.locale_text: ザッカリーはドミンを火葬場の熱い炉から連れ出して、死者の長い列を横目に通り過ぎた。彼らの服は擦り切れており、その骨はオーグメティックにこすれ、その老朽化した肉体を傷つけていた。彼らは悲しげなうめき声をあげていた。そしてその声が記憶を遠ざけていく。ドミンは死者が箱舟を運ぶのを見た。絹に包まれた失われた子供が見知らぬもののために紅の涙をこぼしている。生きていない者は従者が女主人を運ぶように彼女を運び、大きな声で自分らの運命を嘆いた。そのような刃物は、失われた過去を思い悩む、後悔で麻痺した無力な子供のようなものだ。

オア・ワイズはエニムを火葬場の熱い炉から連れ出して、死者の長い列を横目に通り過ぎた。服の残骸はカビで分厚く覆われていた。カビはオーグメティックを突き破り、その老朽化した肉体にまで繁殖していた。彼らは悲しげなうめき声をあげていた。そしてその声が記憶を遠ざけていく。エニムは死者が箱舟を運ぶのを見た。禁止に包まれた失われた子供が見知らぬもののために黒い涙をこぼしている。生きていない者は従者が女主人を運ぶように彼女を運び、大きな声で自分らの運命を嘆いた。それは失われた過去を思い悩む刃物のようなものである。後悔で麻痺した無力な子供。

languages.text: 帷者威茨带着秘者走出了火葬场炽热的熔炉，从无数死者身边经过。那些死者的衣服已经残缺不全，骨头刺破了他们衰败的肉体，摩擦着他们身上的植入物，发出咯吱的响声。所有人都在悲伤地呻吟着，呻吟声淡漠了他们的记忆。秘者看到那些死者抬着一尊圣柜，圣柜里放着某个东西——那是个迷失的孩子，浑身包裹在丝线之中，眼角流着不知名的红泪。死者抬着她的圣柜，就像仆人抬着自己的女主人一样，所有人都在高声哀叹自己的命运。失落的利刃被包裹在卵鞘之中，迷失在失落的过去之中，宛如无助的孩子被悔恨所苦。
languages.original_text: Veni'Zacchary led the Domin out of the hot furnace of the crematorium, and they walked past long columns of the dead. Frayed was their attire; their bones scraped against their augmetics and scratched their decrepit flesh. They were moaning sorrowfully, and the sound made memory fade away. The Domin saw that the dead were carrying an ark, and inside the ark was a Thing. A Lost Child cocooned in silk, shedding crimson tears for the unknown. The unliving carried her as servants would carry their lady, and loudly lamented their fate. Such is a blade mired in broodings over a lost past: a helpless child paralysed by regret.

traits.locale_text: 帷者威茨带着秘者走出了火葬场炽热的熔炉，从无数死者身边经过。那些死者的衣服已经残缺不全，骨头刺破了他们衰败的肉体，摩擦着他们身上的植入物，发出咯吱的响声。所有人都在悲伤地呻吟着，呻吟声淡漠了他们的记忆。秘者看到那些死者抬着一尊圣柜，圣柜里放着某个东西——那是个迷失的孩子，浑身包裹在丝线之中，眼角流着不知名的红泪。死者抬着她的圣柜，就像仆人抬着自己的女主人一样，所有人都在高声哀叹自己的命运。失落的利刃被包裹在卵鞘之中，迷失在失落的过去之中，宛如无助的孩子被悔恨所苦。

帷者威茨带着秘者走出了火葬场炽热的熔炉，从无数死者身边经过。那些死者残缺不全的衣物上覆着厚厚的霉菌，真菌的菌丝侵入到他们衰老的肉体之中，将他们身上的植入物包裹其中。所有人都在悲伤地呻吟着，呻吟声淡漠了他们的记忆。秘者看到那些死者抬着一尊圣柜，圣柜里放着某个东西——那是个迷失的孩子，浑身包裹在菌丝之中，眼角流着不知名的黑色眼泪。死者抬着她的圣柜，就像仆人抬着自己的女主人一样，所有人都在高声哀叹自己的命运。失落的利刃被包裹在卵鞘之中，迷失在失落的过去之中，宛如无助的孩子被悔恨所苦。

languages.text: Veni'Zacchary conduisit {mf|le|la} Domin hors de la fournaise du crématorium. Ils passèrent devant de longues colonnes de morts. Leurs vêtements étaient en lambeau ; leurs os frottaient contre leurs augmétiques et lacéraient leurs chairs décrépites. Chacun de leur gémissement de douleur effaçait un peu plus leur mémoire. {mf|Le|La} Domin vit que les morts portaient une arche, et qu'à l'intérieur de cette arche se trouvait une Chose. Une Enfant perdue enveloppée de soie et qui versait des larmes écarlates pour l'inconnu. Les non-vivants la portaient comme des serviteurs porteraient leur dame, tout en se lamentant bruyamment sur leur sort. Telle est une lame embourbée dans la contemplation d'un passé perdu : une enfant impuissante paralysée par le regret.
languages.original_text: Veni'Zacchary led the Domin out of the hot furnace of the crematorium, and they walked past long columns of the dead. Frayed was their attire; their bones scraped against their augmetics and scratched their decrepit flesh. They were moaning sorrowfully, and the sound made memory fade away. The Domin saw that the dead were carrying an ark, and inside the ark was a Thing. A Lost Child cocooned in silk, shedding crimson tears for the unknown. The unliving carried her as servants would carry their lady, and loudly lamented their fate. Such is a blade mired in broodings over a lost past: a helpless child paralysed by regret.

traits.locale_text: Veni'Zacchary conduisit {mf|le|la} Domin hors de la fournaise du crématorium. Ils passèrent devant de longues colonnes de morts. Leurs vêtements étaient en lambeau ; leurs os frottaient contre leurs augmétiques et lacéraient leurs chairs décrépites. Chacun de leur gémissement de douleur effaçait un peu plus leur mémoire. {mf|Le|La} Domin vit que les morts portaient une arche, et qu'à l'intérieur de cette arche se trouvait une Chose. Une Enfant perdue enveloppée de soie et qui versait des larmes écarlates pour l'inconnu. Les non-vivants la portaient comme des serviteurs porteraient leur dame, tout en se lamentant bruyamment sur leur sort. Telle est une lame embourbée dans la contemplation d'un passé perdu : une enfant impuissante paralysée par le regret.

Oa'Weisz conduisit l'Enim hors de la fournaise du crématorium. Ils passèrent devant de longues colonnes de morts. Leurs vêtements en lambeaux étaient couverts d'une épaisse moisissure, signe que le champignon s'était développé dans leurs augmétiques et leur chair décrépite. Chacun de leur gémissement de douleur effaçait un peu plus leur mémoire. L'Enim vit que les morts portaient une arche, et qu'à l'intérieur de cette arche se trouvait une Chose. Une Enfant perdue enveloppée de mycélium et qui versait des larmes noires pour l'inconnu. Les non-vivants la portaient comme des serviteurs porteraient leur dame, tout en se lamentant bruyamment sur leur sort. Telle est une lame embourbée dans la contemplation d'un passé perdu : une enfant impuissante paralysée par le regret.

languages.text: Veni'Zacchary, Domin'i krematoryumun kavurucu fırınından çıkardı. Birlikte uzun ölü kortejlerini geçtiler. Giysileri yırtık pırtıktı, kemikleri ogmetiklerine sürtüp derman kalmayan etlerini sıyırmıştı. Kederle inliyorlardı. Çıkardıkları ses ise hatıraların silinip gitmesini sağladı. Domin, ölülerin bir ark taşıdıklarını gördü. Arkın içindeyse bir Şey vardı. İpekten bir kozaya konmuş Kayıp Çocuk, bilinmeyen uğruna kızıl gözyaşları döküyordu. Hortlaklar, onu âdeta leydilerini taşıyan hizmetkârlar misali taşıyıp yüksek sesle kaderlerinden yakınıyordu. Kaybolup gitmiş bir geçmişe dair sonu gelmez düşüncelere saplanan bir bıçaktı bu. Biçare bir çocuk, pişmanlıkla donakalmıştı.
languages.original_text: Veni'Zacchary led the Domin out of the hot furnace of the crematorium, and they walked past long columns of the dead. Frayed was their attire; their bones scraped against their augmetics and scratched their decrepit flesh. They were moaning sorrowfully, and the sound made memory fade away. The Domin saw that the dead were carrying an ark, and inside the ark was a Thing. A Lost Child cocooned in silk, shedding crimson tears for the unknown. The unliving carried her as servants would carry their lady, and loudly lamented their fate. Such is a blade mired in broodings over a lost past: a helpless child paralysed by regret.
